PROJECT (libdb)

IF (UNIX)
	INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES (include-POSIX)
	SET (libdblib-sources
  src-POSIX/hash_stub.c
  src-POSIX/qam_stub.c
  src-POSIX/rep_stub.c
  src-POSIX/repmgr_stub.c
  src-POSIX/db_vrfy_stub.c
  src-POSIX/lock_stub.c
  src-POSIX/mut_stub.c
  src-POSIX/crypto_stub.c
  src-POSIX/bt_compact.c
  src-POSIX/bt_compare.c
  src-POSIX/bt_conv.c
  src-POSIX/bt_curadj.c
  src-POSIX/bt_cursor.c
  src-POSIX/bt_delete.c
  src-POSIX/bt_method.c
  src-POSIX/bt_open.c
  src-POSIX/bt_put.c
  src-POSIX/bt_rec.c
  src-POSIX/bt_reclaim.c
  src-POSIX/bt_recno.c
  src-POSIX/bt_rsearch.c
  src-POSIX/bt_search.c
  src-POSIX/bt_split.c

  src-POSIX/mp_fput.c
  src-POSIX/mp_fset.c
  src-POSIX/mp_method.c

  src-POSIX/os_open.c
  src-POSIX/os_pid.c

  src-POSIX/os_truncate.c
  src-POSIX/os_uid.c
  src-POSIX/os_unlink.c

  src-POSIX/seq_stat.c
  src-POSIX/sequence.c
  src-POSIX/sha1.c
  src-POSIX/snprintf.c
  src-POSIX/txn.c

  src-POSIX/txn_chkpt.c
  src-POSIX/txn_failchk.c
  src-POSIX/txn_method.c
  src-POSIX/txn_rec.c

  src-POSIX/txn_stat.c
  src-POSIX/txn_util.c

ENDIF (UNIX)

IF (WIN32)
    INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES (include-WIN32)
	SET (libdblib-sources
	  src-WIN32/bt_compact.c
	  src-WIN32/bt_compare.c

	  src-WIN32/bt_curadj.c

	  src-WIN32/bt_reclaim.c

	  src-WIN32/btree_autop.c

	  src-WIN32/bt_split.c
	  src-WIN32/bt_stat.c
	  src-WIN32/bt_upgrade.c

	  src-WIN32/code_capi.c
	  src-WIN32/code_parse.c

	  src-WIN32/qam_rec.c
	  src-WIN32/qam_stat.c
	  src-WIN32/qam_upgrade.c
	  src-WIN32/qam_verify.c

	  src-WIN32/sequence.c

      src-WIN32/strsep.c
	  src-WIN32/txn_auto.c
	  src-WIN32/txn_autop.c
	  src-WIN32/txn.c
	  src-WIN32/txn_chkpt.c
	  src-WIN32/txn_failchk.c
	  src-WIN32/txn_method.c
	  src-WIN32/txn_rec.c
	  src-WIN32/txn_recover.c
	  src-WIN32/txn_region.c
	  src-WIN32/txn_stat.c
	  src-WIN32/txn_util.c
	  src-WIN32/util_cache.c
	  src-WIN32/util_log.c
	  src-WIN32/util_sig.c
	  src-WIN32/xa.c
	  src-WIN32/xa_db.c
	  src-WIN32/xa_map.c
	)
ENDIF (WIN32)

ADD_LIBRARY (dblib STATIC ${libdblib-sources})
